Dear friends, I'll meet you tonight from 6 pm Capitol Square in #Toulouse for our last big gathering!
The Egyptian people are tired of repeating the mistakes and crimes committed against them and I expect that the popular interaction with the millions of tomorrow will be high ... http://t.co/GRkyVKj4
Today is the Freedom of the Press Day that when you have it, nobody misses it, but when it's missing, it's too late to come out in your defense.
Therefore, let's take care of the freedom of the press that is essential for democracy. Happy day to all journalists and press workers!
Our last big gathering, live from the Capitol Square in #Toulouse, it's live and it's now! http://t.co/iiRTXv0z
RT @JMakamba: A free press: a major platform for citizens to access information and hold their governments accountable. Happy World Pres ...
Epa City Varyná! Housing for the whole Town! Hugs to Barinas! Adam, Farruco, Abundio and everyone!
Farruco, it would be good to explain how much the family has to pay for housing! And the whole financing system!
Because only in Socialism can a fair system like this be achieved! "To each according to their needs"
The people should know that only in a system like Socialism is it possible to do this: "To each person according to their needs" ... Social Justice!
Follow my speech live at #Toulouse now! http://t.co/mQ68vX3P # FH2012
I am today in #Toulouse, city of castagne and victory! # FH2012
I want to thank you already for this first effort. It was possible only because we gathered. #Toulouse
I want to greet all the candidates who went to the primaries! #Toulouse
Cagua, Cagua, Maracay, ay Maracay who saw you! All my heart to the Great and Humble People of Aragua. Hugs Comrade Isea!
If I have given myself a goal, it is of course to be the President of France. #Toulouse
I have also made this wish: if we win, and we will win, I want it to erase the cruel memory of April 21, 2002. #Toulouse
Ah, this debate! The outgoing candidate based him so much hope. You know his qualities of modesty, restraint, reserve. #Toulouse
The incumbent had proclaimed that he would be a mouthful of this debate. I'm afraid he's hungry. #Toulouse
I ask you not to give in to the ease, the frivolity and the naivety of thinking that it would be done. No ! #Toulouse
Do not imagine that victory is here! Victory you will tear it from the hands of the right to offer to the whole people.
What lesson could the right give us? #Toulouse
Unemployment is at a record level, growth has gone out, taxation has increased. #Toulouse
And this right would come to give us lessons of good management? No ! #Toulouse
The main risk is not alternation. Alternation is a chance! #Toulouse
The main risk is that the right can stay 5 more years in power. #Toulouse
There are not two France who are fighting each other, but a France that must choose its destiny. #Toulouse
The border that must be laid is the boundary between general interest and special interests! #Toulouse
At first, skepticism was so great when we said we wanted to renegotiate the fiscal compact! #Europe #Toulouse
And today, there is no statement from a European official without returning to the growth objective. It's good ! #Toulouse
There is justice: when we have been the President of failure, we can not be the candidate of hope! #Toulouse
There was no place where I went without the youth coming to me to ask me the place it deserves! #Toulouse
I love the French even more after this campaign and I'm still suspicious of money! #Toulouse
We will have the immense responsibility to succeed. I did not propose anything that I could not handle. #Toulouse
I heard your call: "French left do not disappoint us, succeed, give the youth a better future"! #Toulouse
Today we begin to deliver the School Achievement Bonus of $ 50,000 to 11,000 vulnerable and well-performing children. A prize for them and their flias
We must win! 3 days for 5 years: 3 days of effort for 5 years of success! #Toulouse
How can we accept in our country that a trader is better paid than a researcher? #Toulouse
When the Congress approves the Ethical Family Income, this bonus will reward thousands of meritorious students of vulnerable and middle class schools
Dear friends, the time of alternation has come. We have been waiting for this moment for so long! #Toulouse
For all these years, the Republican promise has been suspended. #Toulouse
Venezuela Petroleum Power! Well Rafael and all PDVSA! Congratulations and pa'lante!
Victory is coming, I feel it coming! #Toulouse
We must address a new generation that is rising and will know, I hope, the happiness of alternation and change.
I call you to mobilize as if you were a candidate for the presidential election. #Toulouse
The promise of #Toulouse is that if the French give me their trust, the President that I will be will look like the candidate I am.
I am a respectful, unifying candidate: a normal candidate for a normal presidency in the service of the Republic. #Toulouse
I want a victory without resentment, without rancor. A victory that lifts us, a victory of trust, pride. #Toulouse

Summary of the meeting of Dr. Mohamed Morsi on Egypt Channel 25: - Can not move the date of June 30 deadline for the handover of power - the military party ... http://t.co/N53FNTI0
Dr. Mohamed Morsi March of the struggle http://t.co/xqjxJzOL
Come on Falcón, Pueblo Heroico! Come on Comrades, Going to Carabobo! The Great Battle and The Great Victory! Falcon is Revolutionary land!
I'll meet you tomorrow morning from 7:30 on #RTL! Together for the victory! # FH2012
That PérezPirela! That Falling and Running! I inform you that today I approved 500 million dollars to equip and modernize our Marine Infantry
Epa Giving and Giving! Right now I approve 97.6 million Bs. For the development of urban and peri-urban agriculture 2012! Tubazo!
Epa Lucia! That Gonzalo! Hey Faría! I want to congratulate Giordani, Merentes and the entire economic team! Bravo! Let's continue transiting to socialism!
Lucia: reported approval of resources for 57 elevators in the Caucaguita and Araguaney sectors, Edo.Miranda. This financed by China ($ 9MM)!
Gonzalo: I am reporting 169MM Bs approval to finance the small producers of sugarcane!
And another financing for the same item of 287 MM more! We are going to increase the production of sugarcane by 49% in 2012!
Epa Izarra! I approved now one thousand one hundred million Bs. For the MPP Communication for personnel expenses and operation. Pa'lante!
Hugs to the Town of Aragua! There's Maracay who saw you! Come then, PuebloPatriota, to work hard, united, towards the victory of 7Oct!
RT @SwannyDPM: IMF head Christine @Lagarde says Australia's economic leadership is a positive example to the world:  http://t.co/ClwLUkRE
Correction to the previous message: Ay Maracay who saw you! And I add: how much I love that City of Maracay! Long live Aragua! Hugs Isea !!
Greetings to the Carabobo Command of Aragua! Come on, the Deployment has begun! We have commitment size and we will not look bad in History!
Having a great time chatting to students at the opening of the Elim Christian College Junior Campus. http://t.co/YxAiqYyu
Bronagh and I are off to see Jersey Boys tonight, we’re looking forward to a great show!
The highlights of our last big gathering, yesterday, place du Capitole in #Toulouse are to see here: http://t.co/4ss9VTS0 # FH2012
@zehnbar. True...! Hope you are well in germany! Greetings from Rw.
Dear friends, the door-to-door goal has been reached: more than 5 million doors have been opened by my team! Together towards victory!
Dr. Mohamed Morsi is now on Al Jazeera .. to talk about the current developments in the Egyptian arena, and the suspension of the presidential campaign ... http://t.co/851uLTJj
Nafasi nyingine ya kufanya kazi. Nafasi nyingine ya kuutumikia umma. Nafasi nyingine ya kuleta mabadiliko chanya kwa kila mmoja wetu.
Leadership = an opportunity to work for the people, to serve the people, to make a difference, to do it better.
The appointment we have with the French in two days is to give hope to France! # Perigueux
We will give a successor to François Mitterrand! # Perigueux # FH2012
I expect you to give me, here in the Dordogne, the best possible result to win! # Perigueux
The stakes are of greater importance: it is not only a matter of giving a sanction, of dismissing an outgoing president. # Perigueux
What is at stake is the fate of France: to know if it can resume the march towards progress, towards justice! # Perigueux
I have come to tell you that the victory is still uncertain. # Perigueux
As long as we have mobilized all our strength, then doubt will always be present! # Perigueux
The incumbent did not stop going on the National Front! # Perigueux
Here again, the stranger was put in the heart of the campaign: I say it here, immigration is not the subject of this campaign!
During the debate, I wanted to give you pride! # Perigueux
During the debate, I wanted to tell the incumbent what you, for 5 years, had wanted to express! # Perigueux
I call you to mobilization, commitment, voting! # Perigueux
Visit to H DH Atoll. http://t.co/hyVxJuLv
I announce it to you today, it is you who are candidates for the presidential election! Decide on your future! # Perigueux
I salute these humanists, those Gaullists who understood that the incumbent had escaped from this elevation of mind. # Perigueux
I am the candidate of a rally wider than that of the left, even if I am socialist! # Perigueux
It is the Republicans who will allow victory on Sunday! # Perigueux
In the France I want, there are only citizens with equal rights and duties! # Perigueux
Yes, our country must recover, must be stronger economically, industrially. # Perigueux
A press release from the campaign of Dr. Mohamed Morsi candidate of the Freedom and Justice Party for the presidential elections announced the campaign of Dr. Mohamed Morsi ... http://t.co/AmfXP561
The most tasty moment of the debate was when I said "I President of the Republic, I will respect the rules of behavior"!
We must be the actors who bring hope and not fear. # Perigueux
Be proud of what you are! # Perigueux
In H DH Atoll today. http://t.co/xpp9cA4b
Everywhere in Europe, Sunday, only one question will be asked: who is the next President of the French Republic!
You will not only decide the fate of France, but also the direction of Europe! # Perigueux
In H DH Atoll today. http://t.co/xjKf7lbL
European governments also want change! # Perigueux
I often recalled a date in this campaign: April 21, 2002, many thought that the qualification of Lionel Jospin was sure.
We want to turn several pages: the page of the quinquennium, the page of 10 years of right and the page of April 21, 2002. # Périgueux
We will write a new page of History! # Perigueux
I must also convince that youth will be the great commitment of my presidency! # Perigueux
What do we want? Protect the most privileged or protect our children? We chose ! #FirstYoungness # Périgueux
Delivery of farm to peasant organization, La Pasión farmhouse, Sayaxché. 400 families benefited. http://t.co/cXd6FOe7
Delivery of a check for the purchase of 500 desks for schools near the community of Sayaxché. http://t.co/xcSWg8mH
I am sure of nothing, but convinced that we will be able to give our country a new phase of its destiny! # Perigueux
Children and adults alike out to greet the President's team with national flags only in H DH atoll. http://t.co/jPBSwcEq
The French dream finally gave independence to what were called "colonies". # Perigueux
Convictions prevail over all considerations. # Perigueux
Here again, honor and respect for this social conquest that was the retirement at 60 years! # Perigueux
We will finish with fatalities, inequalities. Justice is the soul of the Republic! # Perigueux
Politics will be stronger than markets, democracy will be bigger than finance! # Perigueux
Just for young people, this is the first step of a great adventure: that of a France that is moving forward! # Perigueux
The left wins a presidential election only when it is able to be at the height of France! # Perigueux
If we are called to lead France, it is because we will have been able to speak to the French people! # Perigueux
I bow to the union commitment that must be independent of politics! # Perigueux
We will give the opportunity for major debates: on energy, on nuclear power, on shale gas, on new resources! # Perigueux
In this campaign, what has been right to my heart is you. # Perigueux
The change is now, it's right now, it's Sunday! # Perigueux
